title: AHA Systemic Complications of Acute Stroke Scientific Statement 2024

recommendations.text: Monitor for poststroke fever, evaluate common infectious sources, and treat fever per current AIS/ICH/SAH guideline protocols.
Prevent stroke-associated pneumonia with early dysphagia screening, aspiration precautions, and oral hygiene; routine prophylactic antibiotics have not improved outcomes.
Screen for cardiac complications (ECG/telemetry, troponin when indicated) and manage arrhythmia or heart failure promptly during acute stroke care.
